alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; White (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:17AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern White, Fulton, southeastern Pulaski, southwestern Kosciusko, Cass and western Miami Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 417 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Culver to near Delphi. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logansport, Peru, Rochester, Grissom Afb, Akron, Walton, Bunker Hill, Royal Center, Mexico, Lincoln, Wells, Galveston, Miami, Kewanna, Denver, Burnettsville, Fulton, Macy, Burket and Onward. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Fulton; Miami; Pulaski; Southern Kosciusko; White
